DOC.brief_summary: To evaluate the acute effect of a preload of sucralose in presence of carbohydrate (HC) available on the glycemic response, postprandial C peptide and satiety in patients with type 2 diabetes mellitus (DM2) in intensive insulin therapy (IIT).
DOC.brief_title: Sucralose in Subjects With Diabetes Mellitus Insulin Requesting
DOC.criteria: Minimum period of six month intensive insulin therapy Prescription rapid insulin in the breakfast Aged 35 to 70 years BMI 25 to 39.9 kg / m2 HbA1c lower than or equal to 10% (86 mmol / mol) Menopausal women under hormone replacement therapy History of intolerance artificial sweetener sucralose Pregnant women Puerperal women Subjects with neurological disease, endocrine disorder no treatment, kidney disease stage IV or V, cancer, liver disease, chronic obstructive pulmonary disease, HIV Subjects with history of stroke , acute myocardial infarction and gastrointestinal resection
